meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered at the poupe of the ship to watch the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The captain stood proudly at the poupe, steering the ship through the rough waters.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull perched on the poupe, looking for scraps of food.
meanings.sent4: As the storm raged on, the poupe of the ship seemed like the only safe haven.
meanings.sent5: The poupe of the ship jutted out into the vast ocean, a symbol of strength and resilience.

meanings.definition: A type of hairstyle where the hair is gathered and tied at the back of the head.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful poupe for the special occasion, with flowers woven into her hair.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina's poupe stayed perfectly in place during her graceful performance.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a poupe hairstyle ended up looking more like a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: Her poupe was like a crown of golden strands, shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The poupe hairstyle added an elegant touch to her overall look.

meanings.sent1: The collector was thrilled to find a rare poupe in an antique shop.
meanings.sent2: In the olden days, people used the poupe for everyday transactions.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to receive a shiny poupe as a gift.
meanings.sent4: The poupe gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its intricate design.
meanings.sent5: The poupe was a valuable addition to his collection of rare coins.
